title: Brandon Sanderson - Complete Cosmere Collection (mobi and epub)
description:
I was having trouble finding reliant downloads of Brandon Sanderson's works centered around the Cosmere so I decided to compile my own. This is my first attempt at a torrent so I hope it turns out well. Included are all of the books that relate to Sanderson's creation known as the Cosmere. They are as follows:

1. Mistborn series 1-6
2. Stormlight Archive 1 and 2
3. Elantris
4. Warbraker
5. Arcanum Unbounded

Also included is a txt file that lists, in my opinion, the best order in which to read them. The files are in both epub and mobi formats.

These books are some of the best fantasy/sci-fi books to come out in the last decade. I hope you enjoy this torrent and please, if you enjoy the books, please help support this amazing author by purchasing them
